TestGroupDocumentation.Title: maxInclusive1 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a maxInclusive-1.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a int restricted SimpleType with maxInclusive value -2147483648.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int maxInclusive-1.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls maxInclusive-1-1.xml document which specifies valid value -2147483648 for the int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-maxInclusive-1 element, sets the values: -2147483648 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int maxInclusive-1.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls maxInclusive-1-1.xml document which specifies valid value -2147483648 for the int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-maxInclusive-1 element, sets the values: -2147483647, -3276, 0, 3276, 2147483647 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int maxInclusive-1.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-maxInclusive-1 type, sets the values: -2147483648 and expects the validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML int maxInclusive-1.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of int restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-int-maxInclusive-1 type, sets the values: -2147483647, -3276, 0, 3276, 2147483647 and expects validation to fail.
